name: StylishText
description: Telegram bot helps to get Stylish Text. Create your Fork now.

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

API_ID.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @MT_MyTelegramOrg_Bot

OWNER_ID.description: give your telegram user id here

API_HASH.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @MT_MyTelegramOrg_Bot
